about_the_game:
Connect to any/each Streaming Platform from in the game and watch your chat move through various dungeons as they pick their classes and battle enemies, level up their classes, gain new skills, and defeat the dungeon boss.



  • Druid - With powerful crowd control effects, they build up energy and shapeshift into different animal forms to punish enemies and heal allies!
  • Alchemist - Jack of all Trades! They can use items dropped by fallen enemies to craft a variety of potions that can bolster allies or debilitate enemies!
  • Crystalsmith - Pummeling enemies and shielding themselves with the power of their crystals, this class is a force to be reckoned with!
  • Bard - The power of music brought to life! This Bard is ready to fill seats and inspire their allies, and they're all out of seats.
  • Warrior - Passion and an axe come together to make the Warrior, a class that can take a beating and dish it right back. Protect your allies, taunt your enemies, swing an axe.
  • Rogue - Daring, Devious, and Dapper, this Rogue will do what it takes to win a fight. Steal from your enemies, find their weak spot, exploit it.
  • Wizard - Wield the power of the elements as you wreak havoc on your enemies. They will grovel at the sight of your power, if they know what's good for them.

Each class has unique abilities/skills that you can use help defeat enemies in combat or support other players, each with voiced dialogue, so try them all out and see which one works best for you!



Up to 8 chatters can play in combat at a time, and the game auto-pulls their profile picture on that streaming platform when they send their first message, so they know exactly who they are on screen.



Anyone in your chat can vote on what direction to move in the dungeon, which means everyone gets to help explore and navigate together!



Did your favorite streamer end for the night, or raid into someone else playing Falinere Fantasy? Send a message in the next streamer's chat to have all of your data loaded in automatically so you can pick right back up where you left off and keep leveling up!

Join the Official Discord Server to stay up to date on the game, ask questions, meet the crew that are working behind the scenes, and more!

name: Falinere Fantasy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Falinere Fantasy is a turn-based RPG Dungeon Crawler played via Twitch Chat. Your viewers can change between 8 different classes (Alchemist, Bard, Crystalsmith, Druid, Rogue, Solicitor, Warrior, and Wizard) and run through dungeons, leveling up and gaining skills as they traverse the land.
